full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE GDONG PA CAN GYI BSKANG BSHAGS BSTOD BSKUL DANG BCAS PA MI MTHUN KUN RGYAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA MKHAN CHEN RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE DON GYI SLAD DU MTSAN NAS SMOS TE BDAG GI MKHAN PO CHEN PO CHE DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS MDZAD PA'I MKHA' 'GO MA SENG GDONG PA CAN GYI BSKANG BSHAGS BSTOD BSKUL DANG BCAS PA CHO GA GTZO BOR BYAS TE, 'ON KYANG 'DI NI 'KHRUL MED DAM PA'I GSUNGS 'BYUNG BAS BSTAN 'GRO'I DON LA PHAN PA RGYA CHEN POR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE,
